reviews.text: A very popular brewery , packed with lots of people on Thursday evening! I called in advance to ask about booking a table which wasn’t possible. So we decided to try our luck. The service was really quick and efficient! The service team was obviously very busy. I know there were negative reviews about bad service, but I definitely didn’t experience it. The service team found a table for two of us very quickly and were all very nice and friendly! The foods were very delicious, and the beer was excellent! The interior design was very traditional German brewery style. Ver Nice experience!

Very busy on a Monday evening. Got in pretty quickly without a booking, we were sat in the cellar on a table with another group. They got my main wrong and forgot my dessert but they   were constantly on the go so not that bothered. The staff were very friendly and easygoing. As someone who doesn't really like lager, their classic lager was a lighter and enjoyable one. It was a great vibe, would absolutely go again

Very nice and spacious beer garden.
You have both self-service area and service area.
Beer is fresh. Food is tasty. Typical traditional German food, nothing complicated.
The vibe is good.

Love this place. Step back in time to another place. Take in the history and tradition involved in the beer making over such a long time.  Traditional Bavarian food and great beer makes for a memorable night out.  The staff are good fun and always available to serve you.  Highly recommended!!

Great atmosphere, food and beer to be had here. The restaurant is self-service, with chefs behind the counter to hand you the food. There are plenty of tables and seating outside to accommodate large groups of people. Card payments are accepted.
